item.title: K8 Cheat Sheet
item.description: Kubernetes Cheat Sheet Cheat Sheet for kubectl, kubeadm and general k8s related commands. Troubleshooting Configuration Operations Run kubectl as non-root user non-root@cp: ̃$ mkdir -p $HOME/.kube non-root@cp: ̃$ sudo cp -i /etc/kubernetes/admin.conf $HOME/.kube/config non-root@cp: ̃$ sudo chown $(id -u):$(id -g) $HOME/.kube/config non-root@cp: ̃$ less .kube/config
